pages.title: An end-to-end open source P2P app framework

sections.header: An end-to-end open source P2P app framework
content: Unparalleled coordination and collaboration, at scale
Holochain gives digital agency to organizations, markets, and people. By combining cryptography, distributed databases, and consensus-free validation—new social magic is possible.

sections.header: Unparalleled coordination and collaboration, at scale
content: Holochain gives digital agency to organizations, markets, and people. By combining cryptography, distributed databases, and consensus-free validation—new social magic is possible.

sections.header: Secure and resilient, without servers or blockchains.
content: You install an app, which signs and stores your data on your device.
You share your public data with a random set of peers.
Your peers validate the data against the app’s rules before storing it.
Invalid data triggers a network-wide security response.
The community is the infrastructure. Scale with the popularity of your app.
Access other Holochain apps as if they were part of your codebase. No HTTP client, just function calls with optional access control.
Compute and data live at the edges, which means there’s no infrastructure for you to maintain and defend. Holochain automatically adapts to disruptions and threats.
You choose your own terms. Set privileges, governance policies, and consensus rules according to your needs.
Fast, cheap, and truly peer-to-peer compute and data. No processing fees or block confirmation wait times.
Iterate to perfect. Hard forks aren’t governance crises but opportunities to play a new game.

Workflow reliability tests are conducted to ensure determinism and guarantee data integrity. These tests verify that the workflows perform as expected, and in doing so, they uphold the trustworthiness of the data and the overall robustness of applications.

DeepKey would run as the first application installed on a Conductor, before other services, so that it can register and manage keys for any of those hApps or services. This key management system will be made available to all hApps as a Conductor Service.

Evaluate Holochain's performance over time to identify regressions and understand the impact of new features on its performance, while also providing basic operational performance statistics for Holochain with each release.
We aim to enable conductors to establish connections with multiple signal and bootstrap servers concurrently.
Building the everyday applications that power our lives.

sections.header: Showcasing the Building Blocks of Holochain
content: Holochain is a chain like no other: simultaneously a validated onchain experience, and a fully distributed peer-to-peer application framework. This makes Holochain unique in the world of software and distributed networks. Here are a few building blocks that demonstrate what is possible.

'We' is a meta-app or interface for creating groupware that is shareable, forkable, and fusible, giving new powers to self-governing groups. As agent-centric software, each user decides what groups and applets they opt into.

'hREA' is superpowered economic coordination for businesses, communities, and commons — and the networks between them. It is simple, modular, and composable for developers to build precisely for their groups' needs.

'Syn' is a pair of JavaScript and Holochain libraries that work together to demonstrate synchronous coordination with Holochain apps. This allows teams to collaborate with real-time editing during live sessions.
The Holochain ecosystem is a really fun and exciting place to explore the possibilities and impact of fully distributed, scalable, and peer-to-peer applications!
The best apps of the 21st century will be built on Holochain.
Holochain is providing the opportunity for people to generate, hold and own their own data so that they can do what they want with it, for the first time ever.
Holochain enables collaborative, distributed apps that fit the needs of the communities they serve—without inserting any complicated consensus mechanisms or unnecessary coins to ensure integrity.
I thought "agent-centric tech" was just marketing. But I realised this shift is actually fundamental in moving towards a world where individual and collective autonomy are honoured.
Holochain is the vision holder for technology that is created to support core human values: agency, connection, and freedom.
Holochain just feels right. Everything from the technical architecture, the approach to community, to the broader vision. It feels right and exciting to be playing with all of these wonderful humans.
Holochain has a great collective of people who really want to see a paradigm shift to a more prosocial society and conscious peer-to-peer economic systems.
The Holochain team is set to participate in TOKEN2049 in Singapore on September 18–19.
Join Mary Camacho and the Holochain team at Zebu Live 2024 on October 10–11.

The Holochain team is set to participate in TOKEN2049 in Singapore on September 18–19. This renowned global conference series serves as a hub where key players in the crypto ecosystem convene to share ideas, build networks, and influence the industry's direction.

Join Mary Camacho and the Holochain team at Zebu Live 2024 on October 10–11. We are sponsoring for the second year in a row because the event brings together as many perspectives as possible to work towards mainstream adoption of Web3 technologies.
Holochain represents a new concept in software architecture and provides unique qualities that neither Web 2.0 nor blockchain offer.

sections.header: Explore what people are building on Holochain
content: A diverse community of developers, enterprises and researchers are using Holochain to solve challenging, real-world problems. Here are a few highlights.
Giving groups the capacity to intentionally design cultural values into their groupware tools.
A software protocol to coordinate devices that produce, consume, or store electricity.
NFTs are more straightforward, more versatile, and more cost- and energy-efficient to run on Holochain than on blockchain.

Holochain is designed to address the original vision of the Internet: creation of an antifragile and secure peer-to-peer computing system. Unlike client-server apps, distributed apps allow individuals to communicate directly with one another. The architecture of Holochain mimics living systems in an attempt to reach a greater level of collective coordination, scalability, and resilience as compared to existing systems which are designed around multiple single-points-of-failure.
Holochain represents a new concept in software architecture and provides unique qualities that neither Web 2.0 nor blockchain offer.

Unlike client-server apps, distributed apps allow individuals to communicate directly with one another. The architecture of Holochain mimics living systems in an attempt to reach a greater level of collective coordination, scalability, and resilience as compared to existing systems which are designed around multiple single-points-of-failure.

for creating peer-to-peer applications that are secure, reliable, and fast. Instead of depending on servers, Holochain applications connect user devices directly to each other in secure networks. This gives users the best of both worlds — the autonomy and availability of locally installed software, with the power and redundancy of cloud software. Application developers, in turn, no longer have to maintain and pay for cloud hosting.

approach, putting you at the center of your computing experience. This isn’t just a pleasant-sounding philosophy; it’s actually how it’s built. Applications run on your device, creating self-owned identities and data. Open programming interfaces ensure you always have access, while consent-based permission control protects you from unauthorized use.
Applications are more powerful when they connect you with others. Each Holochain application creates its own
between you and the other users. This means nothing can co-opt, control, or shut down your communications.
Finally, online safety is ensured by

. Each piece of data has a cryptographic audit trail connected to its author, and every user helps enforce shared application rules and identify bad actors. Meanwhile, Holochain’s ‘subconscious’ responds to identified threats and adapts to network failures, making the experience safe and reliable.

pages.title: Crypto and Digital Assets Regulation & Compliance

sections.header: Crypto and Digital Assets Regulation & Compliance
content: Mary Camacho, CEO of Holo Ltd will be a featured panelist engaging with leaders across industries to explore approaches being taken to regulate the metaverse. Geared toward professionals in the compliance and policy sectors, this panel will delve into how we can ensure personal ownership of digital assets and and control digital identity, as well as how regulators might treat interoperability within regulatory frameworks and finally how distributed systems can minimize the the spread of misinformation online.

Arthur Brock, Co-founder of Holochain, will be a featured speaker at Crypto Commons Gathering 2023. Don't miss this opportunity to join him and other leading professionals and projects shaping the conversation on Commons on the blockchain. Contribute your insights and be a part of the thriving Commoners movement. Register today!

Building the new economy together. Art Brock and Mary Camacho join Zebras Unite for 2 days of inspiring and educational content, and collaborative design sessions to co-create the business ecosystem we all need to thrive. Participants will experience collaborative hands-on sessions, actionable talks, meet interdisciplinary practitioners, and have ample time for intimate discussion, collective problem-solving, and networking.

sections.header: Developer Office Hours with Holochain Core Devs
content: Designed to enable developers building on holochain to meet with Core Developers, ask questions, make suggestions and collaborate on solutions. This one hour event will be held every other Wednesday.

Matthew Schutte is attending the Digital Identity unConference Europe in Zurich on June 18, 2024. This unconference is an opportunity to collaborate on digital identity with governments, citizens, and companies across Europe.

The Holochain team will once again have a strong presence at DWeb Camp this August, to explore the theme of migration and how we can move together toward the Web we want and deserve. DWeb Camp is a five-day retreat set in the beautiful redwoods near the Mendocino coast of California, for builders and dreamers to connect, learn, share and have fun as we work towards building a better, decentralized web. Please join us!

pages.title: DWeb SF Meetup: Co-Creation & the Distributed Web

sections.header: DWeb SF Meetup: Co-Creation & the Distributed Web
content: CALLING all creators, designers, and Internet liberators — those drawn to innovations and disruptions enabling new forms of collaboration without Big Tech's capture and control!

Join us for an evening of play and discovery sponsored by DWeb SF, Holochain and the Internet Archive, where you’ll have a chance to create on a collaborative canvas (like a distributed r/place) and experience peer-to-peer software in real-time. Holochain will be showcasing some of their recently released P-2-P apps including Fractal Tribute, where multiple creators work on collaborative canvases & easily mint NFTs where value is distributed proportionately to one's creative contributions.

BRING a laptop if you want to play with these P2P apps on your own device. After that, we’ll break into some small group circles to explore the creative possibilities you see for the future of the decentralized web.

Join Mary at Emerging Tech 2024 on Friday, June 14th in Washington, D.C. This is a place for policy to meet the edges of innovation, focussed on cutting edge developments in generative AI, XR technologies, and the decentralized web.

Holochain is sponsoring ETHDenver 2024. Join us for workshops, BUIDL teams, and Expo with showcases for Defi and Regen. We're excited to have many people from our team including core team devs and founders.

Both Holo and Holochain team members are attending this conference in Berlin. The future of both digital identity and the cloud are issues which we're very much seeking to learn from other experts in the field–and share our learnings—as we all build tools towards a greater collective intelligence.

Holochain Development Environment Setup Support sessions aim to aid community members who are encountering issues installing or using the Holochain Development Environment --- a first step in building Holochain Apps.
Please attempt to install the Development Environment per the instructions at
(note: you can skip the final step in that tutorial that covers scaffolding an example.)
If you succeed in installing the Dev Env and don't have any issues or questions, congrats!
However, if you have questions, or something isn't working:

lists: Ask for help in the  ?-q-and-a-beginners  Discord channel and
Sign up for this setup support session and members of the Holochain Core team will answer questions and help troubleshoot problems.

content: Join members of the Holochain team and other people to try a distributed Holochain application. Experience what it is like to use serverless, gas-less, Web3 apps. We’ll play a game and iterate some new rules together as we consider the implications and possibilities of a truly P2P world.

Join members of the Holochain team and other people to try a distributed Holochain application. Experience what it is like to use serverless, gas-less, Web3 apps. We’ll play a game and iterate some new rules together as we consider the implications and possibilities of a truly P2P world.

Join the Holochain team and community members in experiencing what it’s like to use a serverless, token-less, peer-to-peer, Web3 app. In our hour long session, you will install a Holochain App and get hands-on together before diving into some conversations that will help us all get to know one another a little better.

Join the Holochain team and community members in experiencing what it’s like to use a serverless, token-less, peer-to-peer, Web3 app. In our hour long session, you will install a Holochain App and get hands-on together before diving into some conversations that will help us all get to know one another a little better.

Mary will be speaking about distributed digital identity on June 12th at Identity Week Europe. The conference and exhibition will bring together the brightest minds in the sector to promote innovation, new thinking, and more effective identity solutions.

Join Arthur Brock & global Holochain team and community members at MetaFest 2023 in sunny Croatia. Explore Regen Finance, DAOs & DJs. We'll offer a session about setting up the right incentives in you DAO or community and practicums for devs to Build a Web3 Dapp to Start a Soft DAO.

Join us at NFT San Francisco on November 6-7, where we will be taking part in panel discussions and showcasing Fractal Tribute, a collaborative NFT art game developed by Mary Camacho and Josh Hardy. NFT San Francisco is a two-day conference dedicated to fostering a diverse community of NFT artists, investors, entrepreneurs, web3 enthusiasts and more.

On September 6 and 7, Mary Camacho, Executive Director of Holochain, will be at the Nordic Blockchain Conference (NBC) and taking the stage to discuss the vast potential contributions of the Web3 space. NBC brings together the largest Web3 network in the Nordics with the global community, featuring industry experts, thought leaders, educators, and professionals.

Members of the Holochain team wil be at the Linux Foundation's Open Source Summit Europe, the premier event for open source developers, technologists, and community leaders to collaborate, share information, solve problems, and gain knowledge, furthering open source innovation and ensuring a sustainable open source ecosystem. It is the gathering place for open-source code and community contributors. Open Source Summit is a conference umbrella, composed of a collection of events covering the most important technologies, topics, and issues affecting open source today. As a sponsor this year, you will find us in many of the mini-conferences, from OpenJS to OpenCloud and more. We'll also have a booth in the expo hall giving demos and playing P2P games with Holochain.

We are sponsoring the Our Networks event on July 27, 2024 as part of LOCALHOST. This event is about transitional technologies and computing forms that break away from always-on connectivity. Join some members of the Holochain team for discussions on local-first practices, solar-powered servers, folk software, and permacomputing.

Join Mary at ReFi Barcelona, a local gathering of the regenerative finance community in Catalunya and Spain, sponsored by the CCA. From April 20th to 25th, the event will focus on harnessing collective community energy to build a path to safeguard our planet.

Join Matthew Schutte and other changemakers, founders, and policymakers in Zanzibar, Tanzania, at the Transformative Impact Summit on June 7. This event spotlights the work of those making a better world and empowering them with exposure, support, connection, and funding.

Mary Camacho, Executive Director of Holochain will be giving a keynote presentation at 11:45am on the Main stage, Sunday June 11th. Come connect and discover how Holochain can add validation and inforgeability to NFTs and how communities can benefit from the control, trust and transparency Holochain P2P apps provide without gas or centralised hosting costs.
Join the Web3 community at Web3 Berlin, the leading annual conference for those passionate about the future of the web3 ecosystem.
The event focuses on inclusivity, networking, education and onboarding to Web3 space.

Explore cutting-edge trends, engage with expert speakers, and network with industry professionals. Be a part of shaping the future of the web3 community and build with us The Biggest Crypto & NFT Conference - register for Web3 Berlin today!

Join Matthew Schutte on April 30th at Web3 Dubai as he discusses big wave surfing and internet innovation with the web3 community. Web3 Dubai is a conference dedicated to those passionate about the future of the web3 ecosystem, focusing in inclusivity, networking, education, and onboarding to the Web3 space.

Web3 Summit offers an open and collaborative environment for the community to craft their own programming. Join us in Berlin from August 19–21 for a lineup of esteemed speakers. Individuals, teams, and projects are invited to utilize the remaining space for workshops, presentations, and AMA sessions.

Join Matthew Schutte and the community of builders, entrepreneurs, and outside-the-box thinkers seeking to meaningfully progress human flourishing through technological and social innovation. The event is set to cultivate a growth ecosystem in Fumba Town, Zanzibar by incubating experimentation, nurturing community, and inspiring intentional action.

Join Mary Camacho from Holochain and Josh Hardy with the Rain Protocol at Zebu Live where they will speak on panels and run a workshop for Holochain NFT Minting with Rain. Zebu Live is an immersive 2-day experience that showcases the people of the Web 3 revolution. It will bring together as many Web3 industry perspectives as possible to work towards the goal of mainstream adoption of the tech. Come to London and enjoy conversations and parties with over 3,000 Crypto, DeFi, and NFT professionals from all around the world. It will feature 200+ change-making speakers across 3 stages from top Web3 brands globally, established traditional brands breaking into web3, and startups pushing the edge of innovation. They will speak on topics in the focus of digital assets and digital ownership including Crypto, DeFi, NFTs, the Metaverse, DAOs, and Gaming.

sections.header: Learn how to design, develop, and deploy Holochain apps in 4 days

lists: Interactive, proven course format taught by world-class instructors
Vetted, intimate cohort of experienced developers
Online training course—join us from home or office
Holochain fundamentals, data structures, and APIs

content: Interactive, proven course format taught by world-class instructors
Vetted, intimate cohort of experienced developers
Online training course—join us from home or office
Holochain fundamentals, data structures, and APIs

Holochain is an open-source framework for developing peer-to-peer applications that hit a sweet spot of security, reliability, and performance. It is poised to extend the capacities of blockchain by providing a framework for rapid and easy web3 app development. Together we can help create a new web that supports the technical, social, and economic coordination that today's world demands.

sections.header: Seeking full-stack devs who know Rust and are ready to:
content: Develop immediate skill in building distributed Holochain apps
Improve their peer-to-peer software architecture and design skills
Build Holochain apps with a small group of like-minded, experienced developers

is a former engineer for Twitter, co-founder of the immersive software engineering school Hack Reactor, and a long-standing advocate for the power of cryptographic systems to create healthier incentives and social coordination.

has been building Holochain applications for several years and actively teaching others how to do the same for nearly as long. He was a lead developer in the most recent community-led Holochain Dev Camp and is passionate about developing applications on Holochain.
Additional members of the Holochain community may be in attendance to contribute as instructors, students, or teaching assistants.

The intention of this course is to prepare you to design, develop, and deploy Holochain apps. The intensive four day training will run each day from 10:30am to 6:30pm, Eastern Standard Time (EST). The build dates will also be during the day in EST.
Capability tokens and P2P function calls
At the end of the program, you'll be able to:
Develop Holochain applications in a clean, simple, and robust manner
Think and reason about distributed systems from an agent-centric perspective
Understand the Holochain development environment and know how to navigate it efficiently
Package and release your own Holochain applications
Architect small to medium Holochain applications
Basic ability to write, compile, and run Rust code will be necessary for following the coding exercises.
Familiarity with developer tools such as the command line, Git, and an IDE or code editor such as Visual Studio Code will be needed for various hands-on exercises.

Basic knowledge of web-based front-end development will be instrumental in helping you create, test, and demo an app. You don’t need to be a UX expert; this course is primarily about understanding Holochain itself.
Good collaborative and interpersonal skills; this is a co-learning environment.

sections.header: How much Rust experience do you need?
content: As the Holochain framework is built on Rust, this course assumes some familiarity with the language in order to fully participate.
If you’ve been programming for a while but don’t know Rust, we have Rust study resources that you can use to prepare for the tech check section of our application process.
Get extra practice doing some easy to medium

Our pricing and scholarships reflect our values, goals, and stage-of-development. We’re partnering with Mythothesia’s experienced developer education team who have facilitated many training programs. We’re offering this online course at a competitive price to grow our developer community and support the many projects seeking qualified Holochain developers.

We are offering a range of scholarships to help increase access for qualified students of all backgrounds. Please let us know what you need, so we can start a conversation and direct our scholarship funds appropriately.
Candidate is likely to be very successful in both learning and contributing
Candidate fits the needs of an emerging ecosystem of Holochain developers - in interests, passions, and future goals
You can request a scholarship at the end of the application process.

sections.header: More about Holochain, Holo, and Mythosthesia
content: is delivering the technical foundations of web3 to support thriving, regenerative, creative communities and economies.

hosting connects Holochain's serverless peer-to-peer apps to the centralized Internet by making Holochain apps available in browsers. The Holo network is hosted by thousands of people using their own micro-servers who are paid in cryptocurrency for their efforts.
is Holochain's Educational Partner focused on designing and delivering world-class developer trainings.
We plan to inform accepted applicants by 18 Sep 2023.
The selection process includes the initial application plus a live interview via Zoom, and requires full acceptance of the Terms and Conditions.
We're seeking engaged and committed developers—thus the $100 deposit! This deposit will be fully refunded in the event that your application is not accepted.

Scholarships and supporting funds are available! They will prioritize program fit, as determined by our applicant questionnaire and an initial interview process. Please request a scholarship at the end of the application form. Please note: Scholarships cannot be applied to the application deposit itself.

This is not a beginner programming course; we expect devs to come with a sound understanding of traditional full-stack programming and Rust. For experienced Devs willing to self-learn Rust before the training, we will send Rust study resources before the tech check which is a part of the class evaluation process.
